entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15. POP 70%

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
